author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds a new set of wfs with offset `*.531` to enable running the BPH specific DQM (introduced by https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38540) for a subset of fragments.

#### PR validation:

Run, e.g, `runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 12944.531 -t8` and checked that the `heavyFlavor` DQM histograms are there.
title: Add Wf `*.531` for BPH DQM
